website_summaries.verdict: With multiple sizes and varying grit, this 3-piece crystal glass set takes care of every filing need. The best value for discerning buyers.
pros: Small and medium files have a fine 200-220 grit
Works on natural nails or detailed artificial work
Large nail file has a rougher grit that's great for acrylics, thick nails, or calluses and cracked heels
Designed to have a blunt break for safety should they be dropped
cons: Those with smaller hands may find the large file’s considerable size awkward to handle

customer_reviews.title: Short Life
customer_reviews.text: This file and the other 2 that came with it are not meant to last more than 5 uses. I have only used this file a few times and already the rough part has worn away showing flat glass surface underneath, which is pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: tina leese

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap these are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was really dubious about using a glass file, because i can't stand how filling my nails feels. You know what I'm talking about. But I've fallen in love with these files. Light pressure gently shapes, harder pressure really moves a lot of material. No grating feeling, no tears in my thin nails from the filing. Even my husband and preschooler like having their nails filed now! And the smallest one fits in the Altoid tin I keep in my purse as an emergency kit, along with clippers, lip balm amd a tiny sewing kit.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Harris

customer_reviews.title: Major let down
customer_reviews.text: Not the same item. I purchased these in 2017 and got actual etched glass files that were amazing. I needed another set after mine were lost so I went through my purchase history and used the “buy again” option. What I got was low quality. It left my nails jagged and damaged. The weight is different, the material is different, and the “etching” is a joke. The original set I purchased as around $15 so I should have known something was off.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Broken and incomplete
customer_reviews.text: Even before I took it out of its wrap I could see shards of glass. It’s broken into pieces. Supposed to be 3 files but the package contains only one. Although the wrap label reads set of 3 files!! I’m very very disappointed!! It’s shear cheating!!
customer_reviews.author: Mousumi K.

customer_reviews.title: Came broken in pieces
customer_reviews.text: These came broken and a piece of glass actually cut me while I was trying to take them out of the package. Unfortunately they are non returnable so I’m out money. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Katie ATop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE THE BATE AND SWITCH!!!
customer_reviews.text: These ARE NOT the colors pictured, but a much darker blue/green. Very disappointed these are not as pictured and are not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Cox

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these they wear smooth in a few months
customer_reviews.text: Don’t purchase these they are a waste of money no matter how cheap they are. I bought these 4 months ago and the grit is already gone. I use these only on myself maybe a couple times a week. The grit has rubbed off on several spots and is worn basically smooth on the rest of the file. The reviewer that said the grit is bonded and not etched is correct. These have to be replaced. I probably would’ve done better with a cardboard emery board for longevity.
customer_reviews.author: AA316

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and rough.
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I've been using glass files for years and love them. However these particular ones are too thick for my thin nails. If you have strong nails they will be fine. On mine though, instead of keeping nails smooth they are making them too raggedy. Wish I could find the ones that are thinner. Also, my original glass files came in a great soft plastic test tube with a lid which protected the file in my purse and even if I dropped it. The flimsy sheath supplied with these won't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Celticvirgo

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I already have a review here, but ordered another set for a friend who saw mine and fell in love. I asked her what she liked and she said it was the pedi file. Great for smoothing rough skin! But the nail files leave edges on your fingernails feeling like they were made of glass, with the smoothest, cleanest edge! She said she loves feeling the tips and revelling in how smooth they are, and I agree. I love the feel of my nail tips these days! But the price, which my friend doesn't know, is the best! Many other Czech glass files have poor finishes on them, that wear down quickly. These last! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Housemouse

customer_reviews.title: Best nail files I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this set of nail files. They arrived intact and the color is stunning. I used one so much it was clumped with nail dust - I just washed it under water and it was good as new! I haven't had any problems with the etching "coming off" or anything of the sort. I use them about once ever week or two - so far they have worked out great. They do take off more nail than I am used to, but that's really a non-issue for me. I would 100% recommend these for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Z.Top Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Jagged and rough
customer_reviews.text: They look and feel great at first, but then after one use, it left my nails scratchy and a little jagged feeling. And it’s like after one use, the etching on the file is coming off and becoming smooth in the area I used it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin & Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I'm not really impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for better in these files. I don't find them to be aggressive enough, especially the smallest and middle sizes. I wondered why this might be, so I put them under a microscope (sorry, but I'm not able to get photos). The surfaces of these files don't resemble a grit, as I had expected, but are sort of lumpy and not very uniform. Thus it appears to me that the files aren't really "sharp" enough and don't have a 100% active surface. Although they seem durable, I'd rather use up a bunch of disposable files that really work.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with only two files
customer_reviews.text: This was advertised as a three pack, but only two arrived. I think the middle size was missing, and judging based on the other two, I think that would be the only useful size. The big one was just too big and awkward, and the smallest seemed rather pointless. The hunt for a nice glass file continues.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren B

customer_reviews.title: Lower quality - grit has worn off
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 3 months. The grit has worn off the file in a line where I guess I use it the most. I do like it opposed to regular emery board but it is a cheaper file. I am going to buy a more expensive czech crystal file to replace these. I still give it 3 stars because of how inexpensive it was for 3 files. Just don't think they will last a lifetime (or even 1 year) Appears you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I only got 2 pieces not 3 and they do not file my nails at all
customer_reviews.text: I have never used glass nail files but the people that have around me try these and they don't work at all I supposed to get a 3-piece and only got a two piece and I'm just not impressed at all with these I hate ready negative product reviews because I just don't like putting that things about products that may be other people like but for someone that's try them for the first time go for the ones that have extreme reviews and try to understand better how to use them
customer_reviews.author: Beth Yeater

customer_reviews.title: Did not get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this 3 piece nail file and only received one. The 2 smaller sizes were not sent. Very dissapointed because $10 for one nail file is quite expensive.
customer_reviews.author: M.Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: these glass files are very fragile and were not packaged appropriately. When I received the package I saw the large file was broken into shards. I did not realize until after the fact that the items are not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are my first glass files, and I will not go back. They make my nails smooth, and are very fast to use. I have very long and natural nails that I prefer to file over cutting. These files make it fast and easy. Just make sure you use in a carpeted room. I broke one the first week when I dropped it on tile. It was completely my fault, but still disappointing. I use them every week and they still work exactly the same as the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Moon

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to be getting my first set of glass nail files as I heard they were better to use on brittle nails. I got them and this is how they came😭. So I just chewed off my uneven nails. I am pretty sure there isn't 3 pieces here if they were whole and not broken. I was hoping to give this 5 stars but it's 0 stars if it was an option. At least I only spent a little over 3 bucks
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I really am not sure if this are authentic Czech files but the reviews were great and so was the price. Be prepared though, these are small files. Really small. In other reviews they said the larger one is a foot file. No way. They arrived with prime, on time, and were in great condition. I find that they are a bit hard to use smoothly. If you use any pressure they "skip" a bit. Overall they did a good job and I am glad I tried them.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great for thin nails
customer_reviews.text: I looked everywhere for these files in Tucson with no luck. Should have tried Amazon 1st! I love these! I broke a few nails recently and hadd to file them all down. These really work. My Sister loves them, too. My nails are thin, so emory boards and diamond files are hard to use. Glass ones are the way to go. The small one is kind of hard to use with my arthritis, but the other 2 are great. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Sennott

customer_reviews.title: Wears out quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Lasts about as long as cardboard files as the abrasive quickly wears off.
customer_reviews.author: Jp Huller

customer_reviews.title: Buy These
customer_reviews.text: If you have never used glass files do yourself a favor and get these. They are are great price and work fabulously. With all other files I always had to rub my nails on my jeans to make the edge smooth. Not these, you file your nail and the edge is smooth. I also sent a set to my daughter and she was also impressed. I have absolutely nothing bad to say about these files and the seller is also great. I would for sure buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: After using regular emery boards for all of my life, I just ordered these and have had them for about a month. They do a great job, seem very durable and will last a long time. After a month plus of use, my nails seem in better condition than they did with the regular boards. Not the slightest bit dull after daily use for the past month plus. So great that I bought my Mom a set as a stocking stuffer. She was very excited as she had tried mine a few weeks prior. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kiddiesmile

customer_reviews.title: Nail files came broken and there are no returns
customer_reviews.text: Well I just wasted money in these nail files. I'm super bummed too because they look like they work well but when they arrived 2 of the files were broken in pieces. All of them were shipped in was a flat mailer so I'm not surprised... Why don't they pack it better? I hope they will reach out replace them since I just realized that there are no returns for this item. This sucks :( buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Not what they claim to be
customer_reviews.text: I like Frosted glass nail files. They are beautiful they’re easy to work with. The good ones are all one piece and last forever. While this manufacturer claims these files are that type, by the second filing the coarse grain was wearing out/off, revealing smooth glass underneath. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabz Owens Thorndyke

customer_reviews.title: Thinner inability to do it's task
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend. I have these in a different color, love them. Decided I wanted a second set. These are an imposter! Only got one of the three and it is much thinner, lighter and doesn't file nails very well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Anchita

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Was not etched glass, grit came off immediately with first use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coarse grit works like crap
customer_reviews.text: The first couple of times I purchased these, the ‘grit’ on the file was very fine. It worked great! With this purchase, the ‘grit’ is very coarse— they sorta file your nails, but not very well. Imagine using very rough sandpaper. Photo shows older version (purple) and new version (blue). I am not very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Deano

customer_reviews.title: Just too rough and harsh
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in these glass nail files! The grit is just too harsh and rough for my thin nails. I broke my old glass nail file, which I LOVED, and looked so forward to getting these as replacements. The price is great, and they are beautiful! But they are just too rough and harsh. They may work for others with thick tough nails.
customer_reviews.author: cinnis

customer_reviews.title: Changed their product- it’s gritty like a regular nail file
customer_reviews.text: I loved the first set I ordered 2 years ago. It filed really smoothly, and it was a 5 star product. I ordered a new set to have extra around the house, and it has about as much grit as a regular nail file. It did not file smooth at all. This resulted in me picking at my uneven nails more, which went against why I wanted glass files in the first place. Not sure why they changed their product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: i got my files and they were all shattered everywhere! very disappointed ☹️ even if they didn’t work i would have just kept them for decoration on my vanity but i didn’t even have a chance to review them so very sad it look so cute on the picture what a waste of $4 i want my money back 😢😢😢💔
customer_reviews.author: Hi 👋🏻

customer_reviews.title: Great at first...
customer_reviews.text: ...but they can't possibly be etched, or ground glass. The "finish" is wearing off leaving smooth glass underneath. And it's definitely underneath--not just where my constant use has worn the finish smooth, because it's a shiny as glass there and my nails don't have that kind of power...
customer_reviews.author: A shopper

customer_reviews.title: Superior file.  Handle with care
customer_reviews.text: I don’t write a lot of reviews.. mostly I write a review if I am unhappy.. I cannot say anything negative about these files! I’m a former nail tech and these are the Bomb!!! If anyone complains that they broke they obviously don’t realize that glass breaks. Be careful with them. A smooth file that doesn’t rip at your nails! They are worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Lovely files produce an excellent finished edge--a definite reorder
customer_reviews.text: Love these nail files. I keep the smallest one in my purse. The medium sized file I use on my fingernails. I love the versatility of the large file and use it on my finger- and toenails. The glass produces a smooth edge on the nail and files quickly with just a stroke or two. I have not experienced this before but thought I would try them and I am very impressed. The files have exceeded my expectations. I ordered these for me but they would make an excellent gift. Love the color too. An excellent product for an excellent price. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very useful eye candy. Love these. Will be sending them to my daughters as gifts.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about the files. They're exactly as advertised and came fast. The little sleeve each file comes in is pretty flimsy plastic so I'll be making some better ones to keep them whole but the glass is pretty thick so I doubt it will be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Heisey

customer_reviews.title: Czech women share their best nail secret!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Very nice quality, beautiful colors. I have weak nails, and these work better than anything else I have tried. As an added bonus, with these glass files you can file your nails "back and forth" instead of the more time-consuming "file to the middle only" method, with NO damage at all. I use the super large file for my dog, who despises all things vet related, especially having his nails trimmed. Works great on him; I just am slow and gentle, and keep his snout busy with treats while I work. The money I've saved on his nail trims paid for the item the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi Q.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended set of quality glass files
customer_reviews.text: I really love these! I have tried glass files before, but these are definitely better. It's great to have the three different sizes, which I've stashed in various locations. I also love that these are 2-SIDED files; my last purchase only had the files on one side. They also seem to file my nails more smoothly, with no ragged edges. Finally, I love the colors, too! I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Dr. Beth

customer_reviews.title: Broken but Useful
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for these and was disappointed to find the largest one broken when I opened my package. The bubble wrap wasn’t thick enough to protect these as they were loose in the bubble casing and weren’t tightly wrapped. It also didn’t help that said bubble wrap was deflated and provided no support for these delicate files. That being said, they get the job done and are nice if not broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sahmyah Tittle

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: These do not look like the pictures at all. The large one which is supposed to be for your feet is only a little wider and longer than the finger nail file. It should be a lot wider. The grit is very rough and hardly any difference between the two sides. Also the sides are jagged. Very poorly made product!
customer_reviews.author: Susie S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but.....
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value. Heavy glass. Pretty color. I didn't get thru a manicure until I went thru to the glass beneath the filing material. I do have strong, hard and long nails. Substitute for cutting packing tape of many kinds. These are not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyfirebird84

customer_reviews.title: Does not match color illustrated
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received the files as I loved the color in the photo, but when they arrived the files were dark green over dark blue before It got to the long clear part where the file was. I also inferred from the photo that the files were wider than than they actually are. So read the fine print. However the files are top notch and are a pleasure to use. I will likely order again for my massage students as we go through a lot of nail files!
customer_reviews.author: bmessling

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of 3. They come in little pouches to protect them, which I appreciate. They are very gentle on the nail, while still providing a smooth, fine file. Also, they're pretty! They feel like they are much better for my nails than those rough metal or cardboard files.
customer_reviews.author: yay ILNP

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! I love the pedicure file
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I love the pedicure file. I use it to file my dogs nails. After trimming her nails they still have sharp edges. This pedicure file is really thick and I only need to take a couple of passes with it so that's good too as my dog tolerates the filing but of course doesn't love it. Not having to spend too much time on each nail is ideal. I carry the small file in my purse and have the "regular" one on the coffee table for the evening TV time and relaxing time, when I have the chance to deal with my nails! I will be buying more of these sets for gifts as the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Tam

customer_reviews.title: Painted on surface peels off
customer_reviews.text: Not etched glass. This is a painted on surface that will peel off.
customer_reviews.author: Nelsy Reimann

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The files themselves are fine and work as expected. However, when they arrived, the mid-size one was already broken, as they weren't padded securely. Amazon was awesome as always and issued a refund. Other than that, I have no complaints on the 2 surviving files.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty abrasive
customer_reviews.text: It seems very difficult to find glass nail files with a 'just right' abrasiveness. These are the closest I have found in several years. They are very usable, with enough abrasion to shape nails and not so much they tear the nails, if used with a little care.
customer_reviews.author: Magee

customer_reviews.title: The Czechs are the masters of glass
customer_reviews.text: These are the real thing. They are beautiful, well made, just what I wanted. I have had nice ones like these before that cost around ten dollars for just one. This is a nice price for three. I run files like these through the dishwasher to clean and sanitize them, it does not hurt them at all. I bought knock offs from ebay that weren't actually colored glass, and the colored coating on the glass would come right off, and the sanding finish on the glass would become dull. Don't bother with the imitations.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ehren

customer_reviews.title: Best file, hands down
customer_reviews.text: I love these files! The smallest is perfect for use on my six year old's thin nails and tender skin. I can remove ragged edges, shorten, and shape her nails without fear of cutting her skin or splitting her nails. The mid-size is what I prefer to use on my own nails and the pedicure size is great for pedis or men's hands. These are actual tempered glass, not acrylic or plexi. The "grit" is effective and doesn't come right off like an emery board. Each file has its own protective plastic slip-case.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Do not not work very well
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased similar from a local vendor at a vendor fair, but had broken my large file for use with feet. I ordered these to replace, and to back up the small nail file I had also purchased locally and loved; but these are far less effective than the locally purchased ones. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gatchel

customer_reviews.title: These files are fantastic. I love the durability
customer_reviews.text: These files are fantastic. I love the durability. The big one is so big I don't know what to do with it, but I keep my nails really short, so I think it just doesn't apply to that style. The smaller ones are perfect. They are breakable, so be careful with dropping them. I will never go back to emery boards or disposable files, these could last forever if I take care of them. I had one before that I used for 8 years before it broke and I replaced it with these. The color is also awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a manicurist. Not a huge fan of emery boards and honestly wanted something kind of pretty to work with. These are AMAZING!! You don't need a lot of pressure at all so be careful the first time you use them!! They glide right across the nail and the three different sizes are perfect for every situation I've come across. I will be buying more in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: 2/3 came broken!!!
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I know they’re glass and glass is fragile, but putting all three files in one thin bubble wrap pouch and not expecting them to break is stupid. Two out of the three arrived broken, and the one remaining was the smallest one. The only reason I’m giving 2 stars is because they are still useable as long as I don’t cut myself on the BROKEN GLASS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three sets of these over the years as I and my wife have lost them. Never have I had one wear out on either of us. The three sizes are just right and work well. Out of all the ones I had, I have only broken one file when I accidentally dropped it on a concrete floor. I can confirm they are indeed real glass as it did shatter. I am never buying any other brand of file ever again
customer_reviews.author: C T

customer_reviews.title: They are the best files, I’ve ever had in my 53 years
customer_reviews.text: I received my files today and used one right away! They are the best files, I’ve ever had in my 53 years! No more of the cheap files again! These are priced well, they do a wonderful job, each one has it’s own individual pouch and they are pretty. I’m growing my natural nails and these are right on time! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: curtid davis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. Not enough grit. The Revlon metal ones are way better. These don't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Liss

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't actually file
customer_reviews.text: The files are rough to the touch, but they don't work anywhere near as well as other glass nail files. Or metal nail files. Or crappy cardboard nail files. You really get what you pay for, which in this case is not much at all.
customer_reviews.author: emhallen

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH FILING
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent quality and really do a great job on my poor nails. I have used so many bad nail files over the years and was pleased to find these at such a good price. I saw a set of 3 advertised fo4 $35.00. This is an excellent value. I am pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: empi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this product for 2 months and the “sand” has already worn off the file. My other brand set still works perfectly after 18 months so I feel there is a huge margin in quality. Will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST truly etched glass nail files
customer_reviews.text: These nail files are absolutely perfect - they are truly etched glass, and I have been using them for myself and my husband, and the large ones for our dog for a year now - they haven't dulled a bit. As with all quality glass nail files, do be careful not to drop them on a hard surface, as they can break.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal - real glass nail files.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of glass files do not hold up. You file your nails and then look at the file to see bare glass left behind. These Czech glass files are the real deal. No bare glass. The etching hold up to lots of tough toe nail filing or more normal finger mail filing. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding files for nail and feet!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only love the color selection, but these czech glass nail and feet files are THE best files on the market!! This was the first one I've ever bought one for my feet, and I was amazed at how great of a job it did removing dead and rough skin from my heels. Personally, I think they're way better, and definitely safer, than the traditional metal buffing files. Want a set in every gorgeous color scheme!!!
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I hate it when you buy the little foam nail files and they wear out after like 3 uses. Maybe I'm using them wrong, but these are sturdy and seem like they are going to work for a long long time!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal W.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! With the three sizes works great for me, my SO and my cat! Yes, I use this to file my cat's nails because I'm a wimp about cutting them. When he chews on it he can't destroy it like the cardboard ones. Smooth feel when you file. I carry in my purse and doesn't break even though I have tons of stuff in purse and am not careful about setting it down,
customer_reviews.author: Crazycat911

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and gentle
customer_reviews.text: Nice value, works great on my natural, peeling nails. I hope it lasts well!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Wow so cool
customer_reviews.text: So far I can't think of anything negative about these except I wish I would of had them years ago. I think I might be getting addicted to them, they work great on hang nails and jagged cuticles
customer_reviews.author: Loree Bauge

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for entirely different nail files when I saw these and gave them a try. They are the best files I've had. If you want something that will take the nail down quickly and smoothly, these files will do the trick. They aren't as good for a really fine grit final smoothing, but I rarely do that, so for me they're nearly perfect. I'll be giving these to friends and family at Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Lorri Velten

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Polished Nails!!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous Files!! Forget emery boards, diamond files, dremel bits or whatever. From now on, we're using only these Genuine Czech, Crystal Glass Nail Files for perfectly polished nails. This set is for our granddaughter who saw Gram's set and said, "please, may I have one too?" No wonder, they are functional and yet beautiful. Treat yourself, your daughter, your granddaughter or a friend and buy these Genuine Czech files!!
customer_reviews.author: CardiCorgiCuties

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a nail tech so I am a bit picky about what I purchase for nails. I have had a few poor quality glass files suposedly tech worthy and been disapointed with as others have mentioned a thin glass layer. THESE ARE GREAT QUALITY and are holding up really well after much use!!
customer_reviews.author: Leianne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One of these was too smooth but other two are good
customer_reviews.text: I have another set of these I had bought several years ago, that I love. But one of these, the middle one, is just too smooth! It barely does the job, not enough grittiness. But the big one and the tiny one are both good.
customer_reviews.author: StillLife

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: Love them, they work so well and take the nail down quick so if u have thin nails like me, be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Randle

customer_reviews.title: Not very abrasive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to replace a file I was given, that was accidently broken. None of the 3 files were as abrasive as my original one was. Sort of like trying to burnish your nail on cardboard. I ended up buying another set, at 3x the cost, and was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, best files you can buy.
customer_reviews.text: These files are frickin' MAGIC for your nails! They leave the edges super smooth, and the travel sized file is a must for keeping in your bag in case of whatever tragedy may befall your nails at any given time. As I don't really have issues with rough feet, the large sized file is a bit unnecessary for me, but you never know when that may change. For the price, this is an excellent value, and I'm willing to bet you'll shun all previous styles of nail files once you get your hands on these puppies. Give 'em a shot - you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaTG

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these same ones afew years back. We still have them. There not the same. Very poor quality. We will not buy these again. Would of gave no star but had to put atlest one
customer_reviews.author: dan ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited for this highly rated product to arrive, but when I opened the package, I was met only with disappointment. The flimsy packaging of one layer of bubble wrap in a box with other items was (predictably) a failure. The glass nail files arrived broken in pieces. I expected better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really wonderful files that are beautiful to boot!
customer_reviews.text: Really wonderful files that are beautiful to boot. I liked these so much that I bought a second set to gift to my sister. The glass files are great because they aren't as rough on nails as metal, and don't wear out like the paper emery boards. If they start to feel 'clogged', a quick rinse with tap water washes old nail dust away and fixes the problem. I love these and would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice. They have a good feel and weight to ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. They have a good feel and weight to them. The edges can file too, which makes them useful for small areas. They work well on my thinnish nails without being too rough on them. Plus they're pretty. The only thing I wasn't crazy about is the sleeves that they slide into, they are a bit flimsy, but better than not having any.
customer_reviews.author: SuziCQ

customer_reviews.title: Great deal- great files
customer_reviews.text: Love glass files and this is a steal when you compare it to boutique shop prices where I normally find them. I love glass files except for when they break if you drop them.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy C.

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have had similar nail files in the past that were amazing and they looked similar to these so I thought I would try them. I am very disappointed and feel like they wear out/stop working and never worked very well to begin with. I will continue my quest to find good quality crystal nail files.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Large file arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: I receive my I my files today, and theLarge file arrived broken. large file is broken into Pieces. None of them is large enough to use. I would like a replacement for just the large file ?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Muldrew

customer_reviews.title: Smooth edges, quick filing
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today. So far so good. They are pretty and work very smoothly. Just be aware that the largest file is pretty large and heavy. I think I will get the least use out of that one. The largest file is also significantly thicker than the other 2. I will keep the small file in my purse and use the medium for everyday. I've already noticed that these files do not leave rough edges like other emery boards I have used. Major plus!
customer_reviews.author: S. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work after first use.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product before and that worked great for years. Since they are made of glass, my first set broke so I reordered and this batch is no comparison. With the first ones I had they worked great each time. This one seems that the grain is a coating on the glass as opposed to being made like that. The coating is now coming off and they no longer file my nails down.
customer_reviews.author: Jhai M.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I filed my nails one time and the coating came off the glass. These are not worth anything unless you need a glass stir stick.
customer_reviews.author: 2bulldogs

customer_reviews.title: Smooth As Glass
customer_reviews.text: I love these files. They are really smooth and glide over your nails without tearing or ripping at your nail. You do need to watch where they are made. I had ordered just previously and they were " made in China"...sent them back. These are so nice...only wish there was a metal case to keep them more safe.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Ash

customer_reviews.title: Better nails for discovering these
customer_reviews.text: I like the different coarseness on the large file. It does an efficient job on my feet. I find I use the small file the most, because it is travel size and easy to maneuver. I wish I had found glass files sooner, they do such a clean job on my thin nails! And they don't wear out like disposable sandpaper or steel files. I just rinse them and keep using them.
customer_reviews.author: FatalDegree

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: It works.. it’s definitely not the best quality but it’s not too expensive and you get three. One of them fell and broke but I expected that since it’s glass. Consider spending a little more money for better quality, but this isn’t bad.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: These Czech glass nail files are super! I love them
customer_reviews.text: These Czech glass nail files are super! I love them! I have very thin, flimsy finger nails and very thick, strong toe nails. Thes files take care of both types of nails perfectly! Extremely good at removing the tiny micro-snags on edges of nails that the regular emery boards can never seem to remove. These seem to last forever with just a rinse under the sink to clean them. But, do NOT drop them in the sink or on tile floors or they WILL break!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Belle

customer_reviews.title: My favorite nail files because I can file in both directions
customer_reviews.text: My favorite nail files because I can file in both directions. I hate filing my nails, but with these the job is quick, my nails are smooth and they break less often. The files do wear down, and need replacing, but not nearly as quickly as with an emory board.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Quaility
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't as good product as it has been past. Used once and the filings were gone. Very disappointed in it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Shoun

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this file set. I have one for my purse, one to use at home for my fingernails and one for my toenails. I was so sad when my big file broke, it was my fault. I accidentally dropped it and that was that. :(
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! A coworker recommended & I have used 2x & plan to use a lot in the future. Never using the paper type other files again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: don't use with polish on
customer_reviews.text: So I got this to shorten my nails while i was waiting to go to the nail salon to remove my gel nails. Obviously, it didn't work great, though the largest file managed to do a decent job at filing my nails with the gel on. but without polish on, it works great and the different grits a super helpful when you're impatient or out of time.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: I will never use a normal nail file again
customer_reviews.text: These glass nail files work great. They dont leave snags like other files
customer_reviews.author: Don't waste my time

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Zero stars.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. Don’t waste your money. I’ve barely used these and the grit is worn off.
customer_reviews.author: Britiney

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of high quality files that have a finer ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of high quality files that have a finer grit than your traditional emory boards. This means that it will take longer to file your nails down if they are longer, but the edge that the file leaves on the nail is quite smooth and not rough at all. I mostly purchased these for their ability to be washed after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lo

customer_reviews.title: Broken product
customer_reviews.text: I never got to try these I ordered this color 2 times each time they were smashed into a million pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Kate m h

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed!! Really nice quality. My nails are so thick and jagged sometimes that I actually rubbed the surface of my other crystal file off. This one seems much more stable and I do not worry I will scratch it. I keep the small one in my purse, the medium with my nail polishes and the large one by the shower. Love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product looks pretty but 2 of the 3 files were broken into pieces. Now I have to waste my time sending them back before I can get a replacement. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Hodor

customer_reviews.title: Ok for purse
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as my other brand. These don’t seem to file much off. Ok in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Sizes aren't quite what I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty design, each has its own protective sleeve. Quality is high, and they work exceptionally well. Easy to wash after use. My only complaint is that the middle size one is not much wider then the smallest size (only longer), so i feel that i ended up with two smaller sizes (one of which is so short i don't see its use much) and a very large size without the middle size I would have used the most.
customer_reviews.author: DistraughtDragon

product_meta.title: 3 Piece Crystal Glass Nail File Set
product_meta.description: Green/blue, 3 piece nail file set. Spoil yourself with this top quality, double-sided, 3 piece file set protective sleeves. These files contain no lead. They are also used by many celebrities. Set includes 1-small (3 1/2 inch), 1-medium (5 1/2 inch) for manicures, and 1-large (7 1/2 inch) file for cracked heels and calluses. If you should drop your file on a hard surface, it is designed to break in a blunt fashion. Other types of files that have not been through the tempering and hardening process can splinter and cause injury. The grit on the small and medium file is approximately 200-220 grit and on the large file is approximately 180 grit. Please note, the "grit" is etched into the crystal glass. The cheap imitations have grit bonded onto the surface of the file and wear down quickly. These are the best ones made! You get what you pay for! You'll remember the quality long after you forget the price.
feature_bullets: GUARANTEED to never wear out or wear down. (by manufacturer)
Safe for diabetics. Non-abrasive, will not harm or tear delicate skin.
Tempered and hardened for durability and safety. They are 100% lead free.
These files are perfect for use on artificial and natural nails. They breeze throught airport security.
Set includes 1-small (3 1/2 inch), 1-medium (5 1/2 inch), and 1-large (7 1/2 inch) file plus protective sleeves.
